pageContext.claim: “I was actually sticking up for Sleepy Joe Biden while on foreign soil. Kim Jong Un called him a ‘low IQ idiot,’ and many other things, whereas I related the quote of Chairman Kim as a much softer ‘low IQ individual.’ Who could possibly be upset with that?”
pageContext.analysis: This is gaslighting. Trump called Joe Biden a "low IQ individual," quoting Kim Jong Un, and then, after being heavily criticized for siding with a brutal dictator over a former U.S. vice president, Trump claimed he was actually sticking up for Biden by softening Kim's words.
